name: TagSaleCloud
tag_list: tag-sale, yard-sale, garage-sale, estate-sale, virtual-sales-locally, classified, search, bid
overview:
TagSaleCloud is an online marketplace that allows you to buy and sell everyday items with people in your local community - quickly, easily and securely.

TagSaleCloud helps people post and find tag sales, yard sales, garage sales & estate sales in their local communities. The traditional approach to finding tag sales using the conventional way of driving around town is time consuming, costly and frustrating. TagSaleCloud takes the guesswork out of searching for these sales and it saves you time, conserves gas (i.e. money) and gives you the edge on finding great deals in your local area.

If you’re hosting a sale, posting on TagSaleCloud can help you reach an even greater number of potential local buyers to dramatically increase the success of your sale.

We’re revolutionizing the process of buying and selling everyday things between you and those around you.
